Why use webjeda slides?

Webjeda slides is built using revealjs. The idea is to keep all the slideshows in one place as posts. All your presentations can be accessed from one place!

Another reason to use webjeda slides

It is very easy to apply different themes, background colors and images to slides.

Is it free to use?

Absolutely. All credits should go to Hakim El Hattab for creating revealjs.
